description: From all +â€Ž heal. Compare Latin panax and panacea.

definitionGroups.group: Any of several plants supposed to have broad healing powers.

entries.meaning: Prunella vulgaris, a species in the mint family.
examples: Synonyms: common self-heal, selfheal, heal-all, woundwort, heart-of-the-earth, carpenter's herb, brownwort

entries.meaning: Stachys, a genus of plants in the mint family, heal-all, self-heal, woundwort, betony, lamb's ears, hedgenettle.
Valeriana officinalis, a species in the valerian family.
examples: Synonyms: garden valerian, garden heliotrope, setwall
